Find Dribbles the Clown Walkthrough

Clown Dribbles' hand can be found on a plate next to Popper. Either steal it or persuade him you need the hand for investigation. Clown Dribbles' severed torso can be found on a dead victim near Shapeshifter assassins in the cave under Open Hand Temple.
